Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the fetus is on its feet, then you must push them up, then gently turn the fetus, and then gently swallow it, and then take one foot and extend it slowly.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	But when it has emerged into the thighs, then you command the person to cough, and make them sneeze with diligence, for it will be expelled if God wills it.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not expelled by what we have recounted, then you return the fetus slowly until you put it back in its natural position, for it will then be expelled with easy delivery.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is still not expelled by all that we have described, then take marshmallow root and dissolved gum, and pound them thoroughly in a mortar, then apply this mixture to the vulva, to the lowest part of her abdomen.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	And then apply this compress in lukewarm water, until the hypochondria is relieved.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when the parts below her are soothed, then apply a fumigation of myrtle and place it over her.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And when the fumigation has been applied for an hour, then you make her sit on a cushion, and then make her sneeze and compress her mouth, and remove it, and press the lowest part of her abdomen gently, for the fetus will soon be expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	The fetus is now out of her womb and from her hands.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the fetus emerges in this manner, then gently insert her hands; and then place the woman on her side, with her feet hanging down, and have her lying on the bed, and bring her hands together.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	And then press gently on her abdomen, and then remove whatever is under her feet from her ears until it is ready in the lowest part.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the fetus is not expelled, then take her feet and move them vigorously, and then press gently on the area above the lower ribs until the fetus moves upwards.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	And then insert her hands and pull the fetus gently, and command the woman to push until the fetus is expelled.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	The fetus emerges lengthwise, hanging from one of her hands.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	Be skillful in reducing the hand of the patient, but if you cannot reduce it, then lift the woman and make her walk.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	And if walking is not possible, then have her lie on the bed, and forcefully compress her thighs, and then administer bandages soaked in mucilages.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	And if labor has begun, then have her sit on a stool, and then carefully study the reduction of the hand, and pull the fetus into a natural position, and make the woman sneeze and tell her to push until it is expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	The fetus is positioned on the mother's pubic area, its hands and face are on her abdomen.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	The midwife should hold the baby's hand and carefully turn it slowly and gently.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is pulled out, then place on its head what we have mentioned of oil and mucilages.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	And then instruct her to move slightly, and when you have done this, have her sit on a stool and tell her to lean to her right side, and then instruct her to push; and make her sneeze with moderation.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The prepared fetus is positioned on its side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When the mother stops having contractions in this manner, consider it, and then you cut the afterbirth with your fingernail until the moisture is expelled.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is hanging from the face and neck, then you cut that from the umbilical cord, so that it is not retained and dies.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	Then push the fetus in the directions inside until you place it as it should be, and tell the woman to push herself a few times, and it will be expelled easily, if God wills it.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	Delivery of twins or multiple fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins are born quite often, and sometimes three or four, but this is unusual and rarely happens; but various things are outside of nature, and not alive.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And count them, whether they are multiplied, a second, and they are separated by a cipher, distinguishing them between the ligament in the navel of each of them. And sometimes they are expelled as one fetus is by a similarly easy natural way, and sometimes it happens by an unacceptable way as we have recounted.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if some of them are difficult during childbirth and reach the point we have mentioned about unnatural formations, then you should treat them as we have described.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the midwife is skillful and does this with ease and subtlety, and with patience, and is ingenious according to every figure, according to what is prepared for her by the guiding intelligence to lead to health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	A recollection of what is formed in the womb from embryos and miscarriages.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Sometimes one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and even ten are formed in the mother's womb.  I have personally verified that one woman miscarried six, and another ten, all formed, the cause of which was determined through the measurements of the learned and glorious.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all of this must be within the midwife's knowledge, for it is easily recognized by the small signs of it, and therefore one must act accordingly.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter 76.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	Of the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you treat the dead fetus with what we have discussed in the division of medicine, and it hasn't emerged naturally, and you are forced to use manual intervention, then you must consider if the woman is of sound constitution and not afflicted by any of the conditions that cause fear of her loss.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then the woman must be positioned on the bed on her back, and her head should be inclined downward and her thighs raised.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the attendant should hold either part of her or tie her to the bed so that her body doesn't move away during the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then you should moisten the mother's mouth with soothing oils and with mucilage of marshmallow, fenugreek, and linseed.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife should anoint her hand with those oils and mucilages, and then gently introduce her hand into the mother, and then search with her hand for the place where she can hook her fingers into the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And suitable places for this: then consider if the fetus is positioned so its head is downward, and then hook your fingers into its neck, or into its mouth, or palate, or under the chin, or in the fork of the jaw, or in the appropriate areas of the ribs, or below the armpits.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if the descent is towards the feet, then in the groin, or in the middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And it is necessary to hold the finger with the right hand, and place the curve of the finger in that place which is between the fingers of the left hand, and gently introduce the hand and place the fingers in any of those places we have mentioned, until reaching the empty space.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then place and hook another finger, or a third if necessary, so that there is a pulling inwards, and not an outward extension merely along its own path.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And it should be moved in all directions, so that the extraction of it is eased, just as is done with a tooth during its extraction.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And it is necessary in the area between them that the extension be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then the midwife should anoint some of her fingers with oil and insert those fingers and turn around that which is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the part of the fet is forced out, then the fingers should be moved to a higher location; and do this until all the fet is expelled.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is pulled out before the other, and it is not possible to return it by constriction, then a cloth should be wrapped around it; and then pull it out until it is all expelled, and cut it either at the joint of the hand or at the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And thus you should do for the other hand and the two feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fet is large, or constriction occurs during the expulsion, or fluid is collected at its head, then it is necessary to insert fingers between the spinal vertebrae and to break the head open and drain the fluid, or to cut it with an instrument called "alundat," the shape of which will be found with the shapes of other instruments in the chapter that follows this one.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And similarly, do so if the fet has a large head by nature:  and then it is necessary to cut it with a scalpel, or to grasp it with an alundat as we have said; and then extract the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is protruding and constricted towards the fork, then it should be split open until the moisture in the foot is expelled.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if it is not complicated, nor obstructing the expulsion, then you cut the head as soon as possible.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the lower part of the abdomen is abscess-ridden or hydrops, then you must pierce it until the moisture within is drained.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the fet is on its feet, then the traction of it is gentle and its direction towards the mother's mouth is gentle.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is constricted towards the belly and the foot, then you must extract it with a cloth wrapped around your hand, and cut open the belly and the foot until that which is within them runs out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other limbs are removed and the head is still there, then the midwife should insert her left hand; but if the mother's mouth is open, then she should insert her hand into the vagina, and search for the head with it, and pull it towards the mother's mouth with her fingers, and then insert a finger, or two fingers, into it and pull it with them.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mother's mouth is obstructed by a hot abscess which affects the opening, then it should not be roughly treated.  Instead, a poultice of fatty, moist substances should be applied.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And apply poultices; and keep the patient in waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the fetus is on its side, if possible, it should be turned: and what we have said about a living fetus should be administered.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then it should be cut into pieces and extracted.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And you must not leave any cause inside the afterbirth.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed all your operation, then administer what we have said about the treatment of boils, which sometimes occur in the mother.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if a flow of blood occurs, then immerse it in astringent waters and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have already seen a woman in whose womb a stillbirth had occurred, and shortly after that fire again became pregnant, and shortly after the stillbirth happened again.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	A long time ago, an abscess occurred near his navel; and it became swollen until it was opened, and it began to discharge pus.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to treat him, and I medicated him for a long time, but the wound did not heal.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied some strong-drawing plasters to him, and a bone came out of him, and after a few days another bone came out; and I was very surprised, as there are no bones in the belly.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were bones from the stillborn child.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Then I cleaned the wound, and removed many bones from him.  The woman, who was in good health in other ways, lived in this condition for a long time, but only a little pus was discharged.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not consider this strange, because it is knowledge and aid to what the skillful physician uses in their treatment.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of instruments needed to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Method of turning with which the mother is opened:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a tightening device where the books are bound, to which binding are two turns at the two ends of two pieces.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	However, this turning needs to be more subtle than a tightening device, and should be made either of a reed or of wooden stick.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And let the width of each piece be two fingers and the margin of each be one finger, and the length of each is one and a half palms; and in the middle place of the two pieces are two attachments of the same pieces, which are already fastened, whose length is half a palm and a little more, and the width of each is about two fingers, or a little more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two attachments are inserted into the mouth of the mother so that it is opened by them when you turn the two prescribed turns.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another form similar to that, more subtle and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Let it be made of reed wood or wood, resembling forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at its extremity there are two attachments, just like before, and the length of those attachments is about one palm, and the width of each is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the mother with them, then you have the woman lie on the bed with her feet hanging down, opening the area between her thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument, just as you would with scissors,  according to the amount you want to expand the opening of the mother's passageway, until the midwife accomplishes what you wish.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The method of turning, which the ancients said:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Method of pushing by which the fetus is pushed.
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Method of assisting with which the large head is delivered.
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is similar to forceps, which has teeth at the extremity, as sometimes, and sometimes it is made long, like forceps of this form, as sometimes, which has teeth like saw teeth with which it is incised and delivered.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Method of gentle assistance.
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Method of using a hook having a spine (or point).
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Method of using a hook having two spines (or points).
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Method of forceps with teeth for closing, with which the head of the fetus is delivered.
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Method of a spatula with two extremities, with which the head is severed.
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Method of two wide spatulas.
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All those instruments, the more numerous the types and the better they are prepared by the artisans, the easier they are to use and the more beneficial they are to people.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And do not neglect these instruments, wherever they may be, and be prepared for them, for the need for these is not excusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of the extraction of the second [thing/part/item].
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the afterbirth is retained after childbirth, then you should instruct the woman to hold her breath, and then make her sneeze with some means, and firmly press your hand over her mouth and nose; and if by this it comes out, it is good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then you take a bowl, and make a hole in its cover, and place in it herbs such as rue, anise, chamomile, Arabic cicadas, cinnamon, and centaury, placing the bowl over the mother's open mouth, as a poultice.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs, or some of them, should be submerged in water in the bowl, and place that over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a reed tube in the mother's mouth, and hold it there until the vapor reaches the mother's cavity.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then make her sneeze as we have said, and the afterbirth will be expelled quickly.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this treatment remains ineffective and it hasn't been expelled, then you order the midwife to immerse her left hand in sesame oil or marshmallow mixture, and then insert that into the vagina and try to remove the afterbirth with it.  And when you have found it, take it and pull it out slowly.  But if it's attached to the mother's womb, then insert her hand as we have described, and when she has located the afterbirth, extract it little by little, as instructed, so that the mother does not experience a violent pull.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Beforehand, it is necessary that it be moved easily from the right and left sides.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then adjust the amount of pulling, so that it will obey and free itself from adhesion.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mother's mouth is constricted, we have already described the treatment with sneezing and with medicinal poultices of herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not expelled by all the methods we have described, then beware of exhausting it further by continued attempts to remove it. Instead, it is necessary that what has been expelled from her into the mother's mouth be placed on the woman's thigh, and then treat it with unguents and tetrapharmacon.  For this will cause it to decompose over several days and dissolve, and thus be expelled.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	However, when it decomposes, a foul odor rises to the head and stomach, and this afflicts the patient; and then it is necessary to administer fumigations and remedies appropriate to this.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	However, some of the ancients already tested fumigations with juniper and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Shape of the instrument with which the woman is fumigated for the retention of menstrual blood and the afterbirth:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of glass or brass.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And place the thin end in the container and the wide end over the fire, and the fumigation material should be placed on the embers of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep it there until the fumigation is consumed and put in another.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Of the treatment of the unperforated anus of the child.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Many children are born with their anuses unperforated, which are already narrow and obstructed.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then it is necessary for the midwife to pierce that narrowing with her finger; and if not, pierce it with a sharp instrument, and be careful not to touch the rectum.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And then place over it wool soaked in wine and oil; and then treat it with ointment until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it is obstructed, then place a tube in the opening for many days, and remove it when the child wants to swallow.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And blockage of the anus may occur due to the consolidation of a plague or an abscess; then it is necessary that that consolidation be incised, and then be treated with what we have said about the treatment and lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Of the treatment of the fistulas that arise from there.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	Fistulas that form in the lower region,  owing to a swelling and thickening, which form near the anus externally or in the space between the buttocks.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or abscesses.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And when that swelling is longstanding and oozes a watery, whitish fluid or a subtle pus, and sometimes these fistulas are also deep-seated.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those deep-seated ones are recognized by what comes out of them, by the discharge and by the windiness; and sometimes the patient has a discharge, and often worms come out of them.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And sometimes these fistulas extend into the bladder, and into the urethra; and some of these deep ones extend into the joint of the thigh and into the groin area.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And how a deep-seated fistula in the anus is distinguished from a non-deep-seated one is that you insert your index finger into the anus, and gently probe for a thin rod of a ramrod or iron in the fistula if there is no obstruction.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is an obstruction in it, then insert a thin probe of lead or horsehair until you feel the probe or hair on your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you feel nothing at all, and there is no discharge of any kind, either worms or windiness, as we have said, then know that it is not deep-seated, and therefore your treatment is appropriate.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula extends into the bladder or into the urethra, then its sign is the presence of urine from there, and a prohibition of urination until the area is healed with medicine.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it extends into the hip joint or into the bone, and there is pain in the surrounding area, then its sign is that the probe penetrates there, if there is no obstruction into the bone, and pain in the surrounding area; and that it is likely to remain this way; and that no medication will be effective or will heal with ointment.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those deep-seated fistulas, there is no complete cure, and the treatment for them is the labour and vanity of foolish doctors, upon which one should not rely.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	But in those that are not deep-seated and not long-standing, healing with iron is expected, as I will tell you, and this I have already tried and proven.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is necessary that the patient lies on their back with their legs raised upwards, their thighs bent towards their stomach, and then carefully insert a lead probe, or an iron one if there is a bend in the fistula, until you know the exact spot where the probe penetrates.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if the pain is around the anus, then you should insert your index finger into the anus.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel the probe already penetrating on your finger, or if you feel something between your finger and the tissue or flesh, then know for certain that it is deep-seated; and then do not work on it, for there is no cure in such a case, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But nevertheless, some might say that it heals in some men slowly.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And the treatment by which healing is expected is that you heat a thin cautery according to the width of the fistula, as previously described, and insert that heated cautery into the fistula until it reaches around the anus; and then repeat this two or three times until you know that all the inflamed flesh and fistula-like tissue which resembles a bird feather quill are now cauterized.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then treat it with some bandages until all the cauterized flesh is healed, and then treat it with medicines that generate and solidify flesh.  If it is healed, well and good; but if not, then it will not be healed at any time by any other treatment.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the probe enters, but does not penetrate to your finger in the anus, and between the probe and that is a thick layer of flesh or tissue, and the fistula is on the surface of the hard skin, then cut the hard skin at the beginning of the fistula, and you should cut with the probe, and move it in the fistula until the incision reaches the place where the end of the probe reaches, and by the probe, it is freed and extracted.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then clean those fistula-like tissues, which are like a bird feather quill, and no trace of them remains.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	But if blood flow occurs between you and your procedure when you cauterize those tissues, then the best and most immediate instrument is to cauterize with fire or with a sharp medicine, for cauterization with fire has two good effects: it is the cauterization of the inflamed tissues and the excision of the blood, removing the moisture.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then treat it with bandages or a crushed cloth until the wound is closed, and then treat the wound with ointments that generate and consolidate hard flesh.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And these medicines, which involve astringency and excision, when then restored, are healed and you need not fear a recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the fistula has already reached the anus and is distant from the body's surface, then insert your finger into the anus and examine it with that.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And therefore, if you feel resistance and between you and it is a layer of phlegm or flesh, and it is close to penetration, then there is no operation there, but rather a treatment through trust and hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	This condition can be addressed in one of three ways: either cauterize it as we have said; or excise it until you achieve its cavity, so that you can insert remedies and the treatment is effective; and do not proceed too much with excision, so that you do not cut the ligament that contains the bowel, and that would lead to harming the patient unintentionally; and then treat it as we have said, for a quick cure will result; or separate the membrane and clean the pus that you dry with excision near the anus, as we have said, either with a probe or with another instrument with a sharp tip, and then clean the fistulous flesh which is in the excision, until you can treat it with a scab; and then strive to restore the entire wound with excision, and if the orifice above is not healed, and the fistula remains open in the anal region, it will be less arduous for the patient.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes the fistula is cured in this way: when you insert the probe into the fistula, and it is located in the folds of the anus near the body's surface, with the curve and at the margin of the anus, then take a probe with a perforated tip, which is like a needle used to prepare skin in this manner:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	and insert into that a probe wrapped in five probes or around those; and then insert a probe with a probe inside the fistula until you reach its cavity.
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	However, if it is penetrating at the margin of the anus near the inside, then you withdraw the probe from that opening as if you were inserting your finger into the anus; and withdraw the tip of the probe and join the two ends together, and tighten each one, and leave it for one or two days. And when you further cut the probe into the flesh, tightly hold it until the flesh that is between the two ends of the probe is cut and falls away.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	And then treat the wound until it is healed and sound.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	But if the opening of the fistula is not penetrating, then make it penetrate, in whatever way is prepared for you, but not too much into the peritoneum, for it is not up to you to do that so as not to cut the intestines; and then treat it until it is healed.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The shape of the spatula with which the fistula is opened: the curvature of which is very sharp, and the other part is not sharp, so as not to cut what is not necessary, just as sometimes happens.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Of the suturing of hemorrhoids in which blood flows in the incision of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids are of two kinds, for either they are between the buttocks, similar to bunches of grapes, or they are like clusters of grapes.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And of those, some are small and some large, and the blood flows from them constantly, and some are one, and some are many, and some are outside the anus, and on its extremities.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	However, those that are outside the anus are according to the measures of little moisture, from which flows yellowish water or a little blood with continuous matter, and it is according to the color of the matter.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the treatment for those that are inside the anus is to order the patient to sit and press until the anus opens and the hemorrhoids appear to you.
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you grasp and lift them with tweezers or your fingernails, and then cut them away from their roots.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	However, if the tweezers are not holding them because of their moisture and softening, then take them with a rough cloth or cotton or a piece of wool, and remove them with your fingers, and then cut them and sprinkle some warm powders over the incisions, so that they are there instead of cauterization; or cauterize them as is previously described in the chapter on cauterization.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And then treat them with the other treatment until they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the anus does not open, then prick the patient with a pricker in which there is a small bite, and wash with what is in the anus, so that it opens easily when the patient presses.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	However, if the hemorrhoids are outside the anus, then their cause is slight, and you should grasp them with your fingernail, or with tweezers, cut them, and then treat them with what we have said until they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	And whoever has made the incision, must stitch them using this method: take a thin thread and thread it through a needle, then pull the hemorrhoids apart, and using the needle, pierce into the root of the other side, and wrap the two ends of the thread along the lower part of the needle, in a horizontal manner. Then tightly constrict the hemorrhoid with the stitch, and afterwards tie the thread and remove the needle.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	Do this to all of them, and leave one unsewn, so that the excess blood can flow from it.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	Then place a cloth soaked in rubbed oil or ointment on the anus; place it over the anus and tell the patient to rest.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then leave it until it falls out; and when it has fallen out, treat it with ointments or other remedies until it is healed.
De curacio de fistulas.	Of the treatment of fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Many times they happen due to the cutting of a fissure or due to a constriction of nature.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And if they are old and do not respond to that medicine, then you should scrape them with the tip of a spatula or your fingernail until they are moist and the scab of pus above them is removed, which prevents their consolidation; then treat them until they are consolidated.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	Then you scrape them with a more forceful scraping than the first until much blood is drawn and they are raw; then treat them until they are healed.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	Of the treatment of elephantiasis, that is, a key (or important) issue.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	Know that elephantiasis, that is to say, a key (or important) issue, and is not otherwise known, is a reddish swelling like a nail head, and it forms on the whole body, especially in the parts below the feet and on the legs, and it is caused by that swelling.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	And then it is necessary to cut that which is around the swelling, and hold it with scissors or forceps, and uproot it from its root; and then treat that.
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize it according to what is previously described in its chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	But a wart is a small, rough, fistulous, round protuberance on the body's surface, and often appears on the hands of children.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	And its treatment is to scrape and cut it, or to squeeze it with a file or a peel until it bursts.
E si vols, cauteriza aquo, segon que havem dit, am foc o am medicina acuta.	And if you wish, cauterize this, as we have said, with fire or with a sharp medicine.
E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And now they are eradicated in reverse and in normal directions with the instrument that I will name.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	But a pimple is a small, rough, or fistulous, thick protuberance on the surface of the body, often appearing on the face, and when the cold encounters it, it is felt like an ant bite, and forms around the body.
E curacio de lu es que prenguas una canula de pena de auca o de pena de voltor, e sia fort, e pausa aquela sobre la formigua entro que la contengua le cercle de la canula de las partidas de lu; e aprop revolveys la tua ma am la canula entro que inscidas aquo que es en le circuit de la formigua, e pauses aquela en le preon de la carn, e que eradiques la formigua de la sua razit.	And the treatment for it is to take a hollow tube made of a bird's feather or a vulture's feather, strong, and place it over the pimple until the tube encircles the area of the pimple; then rotate your hand with the tube until it cuts through whatever is around the pimple, and press it into the flesh, eradicating the pimple from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish, do this with a tube of bronze or iron in this way:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	Let the part above the tube be thin, closed (meaning not perforated), wrapped so that the grip on it is shortened and its rotation is easier.
E si vols cauteriza la formiga segon que es denant dit en la cauterizacio de atheyl en le capitol de cauteri.	And if you wish, cauterize the pimple as previously described in the section on cauterizing boils in the chapter on cauterization.
De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	Concerning the instruments used for administering this treatment.
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Sometimes cauterization is done with silver or brass or cast or hammered bronze; and sometimes it is done with instruments small and large, according to those for which they are administered, for that which is administered in the treatment of small children should be small; and for those whose buttocks are sore or painful, the cauteries for those should be small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The form of large and small cauteries:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	The head of the cannula above, on which the bag is tied, should be wide in this manner; and there should be a clear distinction where the bag is tied, just as usual.
E la extremitat de lu pus dejus, la qual es entromesa en le cul, sia sorda (so es no-uberta) mot leon, atrasent a subtilita; e en la un del latz de lu sian dos traucs, e en l’autre costat un trauc, e sia la amplesa del trauc segon la groseza dels rays e pus gros un petit.	And the lower end, which is inserted into the buttock, should be closed (that is, not open) very tightly, gradually tapering to a thin point; and on one side of it there should be two holes, and on the other side one hole, and the size of the holes should be according to the thickness of the rays, and a little bigger than the smallest.
E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	And the bag, in which the medicines for the bladder of an animal or sheepskin are placed, should be a palm in width.
E sia perforada per motz traucs ayssi cum es revolvuda; e si l’espazi le qual es entre les traucs la grossetut del dit.	And it should be pierced with many holes, just as it is rolled; and if the space between the holes is the width of a finger.
E aprop entromet en aquels traucs fiel fort de fiel cru le qual sia de detz fiels, o enviro aquels; e ajusta am aquel la borsa; e quan es pausada en lu la borsa, sia streyt en le cap del cristeri entre dos distingentz am fort costriccio, e aprop cristeriza am aquel quascun trauc: Mays la qualitat de cristerizar am aquel es que tu omples la borsa de la medicina, que sia escalfada segon la quantitat de la tolleransa del malaute; e guarda te que no sia trop cauda ni trop freja.	And then insert into those holes a strong, thick, crude (or perhaps, "raw")  bile, amounting to ten parts or roughly so; and attach that to the bag; and when the bag is placed in position, tightly bind the top of the crutch (or "stick") between two distinguishing points with strong constriction, and then bind each hole with it.  However, the technique of binding with this is that you fill the bag with medicine, which should be heated according to the patient's tolerance; and be careful that it is neither too hot nor too cold.
E aprop le malaute sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos, e eleva las suas cambas en sus e pausa dejos lu un cuer sobre le qual ja so les homes o un lansol; e aprop unta la extramitat del cauteri am oli o am album de huou o am mucellage de fenugrec o de semblantz; e aprop entromet aquel en le cul am facilitat, e aprop le ministre prengua la borsa e exprema aquel am doas mas e essemps am vehemencia entro que sia evacuat en le budelh tot aquo que es en le cristeri; e aprop extra le cristeri e le malaute leva las suas cambas a la paret.	And now the patient should lie on their back, raise their legs, and place a cloth underneath them, perhaps a sheet or blanket; and then anoint the end of the cautery with oil or egg white or with mucilage of fenugreek or similar; and then insert this into the buttock with ease.  Then the attendant should take the bag and squeeze it with both hands forcefully until everything contained in the crutch has been evacuated into the bowel; then remove the crutch and let the patient lower their legs to the side.
E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament.	And if the medicine causes expulsion in this way, hold it in place for as long as possible; and if they sleep with it all through the night, it is better for healing.
Mays si tu cristerizas aquel en las malautias de solucio de ventre e l’eyssiment de lu le coyta, lahoras tu itera le cauteri entro que sia sanat.	However, if you use this crutch in cases of loose bowels and expulsion from the body, then you repeat the cautery until it is healed.
E si en le cul so emorroydas o apostemas ledens, lahoras sia le cristeri mot subtil e leon, dels cristeris am les quals les enfantz so criterisatz.	And if there are hemorrhoids or festering sores in the buttock, then the crutch should be very small and slender, like those used to treat children.
De curacio de las plaguas.	Of the treatment of plagues.
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	I have already said in the division of the treatment of plagues what was appropriate for the book, and I say thus about the treatment of those with hands and medicines according to the fulfillment.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	Therefore, I say that plagues are diversified according to where the plagues are caused and according to the location on which the plagues fall.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes why plagues are often inflicted are like throwing stones, or cutting with a sword or knife, or striking with a lance, or with a staff, or with an arrow, or similar to those from many causes.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	But the plagues that are on the parts of the body are like a plague that falls on the head, or the neck, or the feet, or the belly, or the liver, and similar to those of the limbs.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And I am recounting the treatment of some plagues, so that you may apply that reasoning and rule to other plagues.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	And I will begin with the simple plagues of the head, for the remembrance of the compounded ones will come at the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	Therefore I say that when a simple plague occurs on the head, and it is not a fracture, then consider: if it is from throwing a stone or similar, and only the scalp is broken and it is a severe wound, and you fear the onset of a hot abscess in that patient, then you should quickly perform phlebotomy on the cephalic vein, and do not delay this; and draw blood from him according to his strength, unless some other cause prevents phlebotomy, especially if the blood that has come out of the wound is little.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	And let the phlebotomy be on the opposite side of the affected part; and protect the patient from repletion and from heavy foods and drinks.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	But if some cause prohibits the reduction of food, then reduce the amount of food and do not allow him to eat meat or drink wine.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And if an abscess develops on the wound, apply a poultice of softened oil or wine with a styptic agent.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	But if a hot abscess is certain, then apply to the wound, if it is recent, its own blood and the air has not altered the powder that I will shortly recommend.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already altered it, then apply some ointments until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	But if the wound is large or caused by a cut or similar injury, and its edges are not brought together with sutures, then bring them together with sutures, as I will recommend for their suturing.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	However, if the wound has already exposed the bone and tendons, and its only problem is a small detachment, then cut it open and then treat the wound with medicines and restore the flesh in its place, and instruct the patient to consume foods that are rich in fat: head and feet, and similar things, until it is healed.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	And if you find putrefaction in the bone and it does not adhere to the bone, then you cut away all the putrid material and discard it, and then treat it.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	But if in these wounds there is an artery or vein from which blood may flow, and it has not been severed by medicines, then you investigate the artery, and if you find it uncut, then you cut it with a spatula, or tie it off; and if necessity compels you that what we have said does not work, then cauterize it until the blood is stopped.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	And if these wounds are simple and small, then their cause is slight; therefore, you can powder them with this powder, for it will consolidate them before the air alters them.
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	And the way to make the powder is this: take one part olive oil, two parts dragon's blood, and three parts of unquenched lime; grind all of it thoroughly and sieve it, and then fill the wound with it, and bind it tightly until it adheres well and coagulates with the blood.
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	And then you bind it with bandages and leave it, and do not loosen it until it is no longer inflamed, for the medicine will not be eradicated from it until it is healed.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And sometimes this alone suffices, when you do not have in your presence oil of roses and dragon's blood.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And you do this same procedure on large wounds when it is appropriate to apply it and bind them tightly, and on recent wounds with their own blood, which the air has not yet altered.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And if the air has altered them, especially during summer, then this powder is not appropriate.  Instead, treat them with what we have previously described, or apply digestive ointments, or a poultice of barley flour mixed with water and honey until it hardens; and then treat them with the other methods until they are healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	But if a small fracture occurs in the bone alongside the wound, then you extract it by manipulation.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor.	And I will describe the treatment of head fractures in what follows.
De las plaguas del col.	Of wounds to the neck.
Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.	But if a wound occurs on the neck, there is no difference in treatment from a simple wound to the head.
Mays si ja le nervi del col es inscis o arteria, lahoras si es nervi, no es en lu engen sino que sia evitada curacio de lu am aquo que fa vehement stipticitat, ayssi cum ziniar e zegi que es vetriol e semblantz a lor quar nozo als nervis e contrazo aquel.	However, if the neck's nerve or artery is cut, then if it's a nerve, it's not an emergency unless the treatment avoids causing excessive astringency, such as using zinc or verdigris (copper sulfate) and similar things, as they damage nerves and cause them to contract.
E no pauses sobre la plagua alcuna causa de tot freja, quar la sustancia dels nervis es freja e la continuacio de lu es am le cervel, le qual es le pus aut de totz les membres.	And do not apply anything cold to the wound, for the substance of the nerves is cold and its continuation is with the brain, which is the highest of all the limbs.
E si’ aquo am que es curat de medicinas leugieras, ayssi cum es caus lavada am aygua dousa, alcuna veguada enfusa en oli rozat o no-rozat, e thucia quan es lavada am aygua dousa e las autras peyras minarantz segon aquesta manieyra, e enguentz humitz.	And if this is treated with gentle medicines, such as washing with fresh water, sometimes infused in oiled or un-oiled materials, and poultices when washed with fresh water, and other softening stones in this manner, and moist ointments.
Mays si la plagua es gran, lahoras aministra sutura, o coarta las labias de lu, e aprop cura aquela am pulvils entro que sia sanada.	But if the wound is large, then apply sutures, or close its edges, and then treat it with powders until it is healed.
Mays si a la plagua es profunditat o accideys en lu a la pus bassa partida poyredura, lahoras perfora aquela en le loc mays depremegut.	But if the wound is deep or reaches the lower, most vulnerable part of the flesh, then pierce it in the deepest point.
Mays si en la plagua ja es inscisa arteria e es conseguit flux de sanc, lahoras separa o secca aquela, o lia aquela, o cauteriza aquela si necessitat te provoca ad aquo.	But if an artery is already cut in the wound and blood is flowing, then either tie it off, or cauterize it if necessary.
Mays si ja ha insciditz les spondils del golayro o tot, e so salvadas las venas del col, lahoras tu ajusta las labias de la codena am sutura sobre la cana del golayro e no toques aquel; abantz egala aquel e reduzeys aquel sobre la sua figura natural, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent, e leyssa aquela per alcus jorns; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz en les quals es stipticitat e excitacio entro que sia sanat.	But if the vertebrae of the neck or the whole neck are severed, and the veins are safeguarded, then you must join the edges of the neck wound with sutures to the neck bone and do not touch it.  First, align it and restore it to its natural shape, then firmly bind it with a suitable bandage, and leave it for a few days; and then treat it with ointments that have astringent and stimulating properties until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquela, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.	But if the wound has already reached the bone, you must treat it, and if there are fragments of bone within, remove all that you can; and what you cannot remove, leave it until the wound begins to suppurate, and the separation and expulsion of the debris is eased.
E si la plagua es recent lahoras polveriza sobre aquela polvera la qual t’e recomtada.	And if the wound is recent, then sprinkle powder on it, as instructed.
Mays si en la plagua es fayta fistula, lahoras cura aquela am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra aprop en le sieu capitol.	But if a fistula has formed in the wound, then treat it with what the recollection will provide in its chapter.
De las plaguas del col o de semblantz quan fayta entre las spallas e es fayta am spaza o am cotel o am lansa o am semblantz.	Of wounds of the neck or similar ones, when made between the shoulders and inflicted with a blow from a weapon like a sword, knife, spear, or similar.
Si es percussio de lansa o de cotel, e vezes de lu la profunditat, lahoras considera mays si de la plagua yeys ventositat quan le malaute elena; lahoras sapias que la plagua es mortal.	If the wound is from a spear or knife, and you observe its depth, then consider further whether the wound is windy (full of air) when the patient breathes; if so, know that the wound is fatal.
E si en lu no es profunditat e la plagua es recent am le sieu sanc, lahoras tu pauses en lu de la primieyra horo polvera, e no strenhas aquel per que no sia le sanc retengut en la profunditat de lu e que retorne al cor e que aucigua le malaute, mays pausa en lu enguent atractiu, e deslia aquela doas veguadas le dia.	And if it is not deep, and the wound is recent with its own blood, then you place on it, at first, a powder, and do not press on it so that the blood is not retained deep inside and returns to the heart and kills the patient, but place there an attractive ointment, and apply it twice a day.
E si l’enguent no es a tu present, lahoras tu pausa en le orrifici de la plagua coto viel per que sucque aquo que yeys de las humiditatz; e fay que le malaute dorma sobre la plagua per que corra aquo que es en lu ajustat.	And if the ointment is not available to you, then you place in the wound opening old cloth, so that it absorbs the moisture; and make the patient sleep on the wound, so that what is inside the wound will drain out.
Mays si ja de la plagua son passatz tres dias o mays e no accideys al malaute spasme ni tremor de cor mal ni strictura de ale, e vezes las autras dispozicios bonas de lu, lahoras sapias que plagua es salva; e adonc cura aquela am calguas e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanada.	But if three days or more have passed since the wound was inflicted, and you observe no spasms or tremors in the heart, nor constriction of the breathing, nor other bad conditions, then know that the wound is safe; and then treat it with poultices and other remedies until it is healed.
Mays si la sanacio de lu es excusada, e ja tot temps es uberta, lahoras sapias que ja es fayta fistula; cura donc aquela per le sieu capitol.	But if healing is impossible, and it has been open for a long time, then know that a fistula has formed; therefore treat it according to its own specific treatment.
E si la plagua es per inscisio de spaza o de cotel, e es simpla en la superficia del pietz o del dos, lahoras cura aquela am aquo que es precedit de sutura, si es gran, o am polvera, si es petita.	And if the wound is from a cut with a knife or sword, and is superficial on the foot or leg, then treat it with stitches, if it is large, or with powder, if it is small.
Mays si ja ha fayta enprecio en le os, e so ja de lu inscizas pessas, lahoras tu torqua la plagua e coyta ad extrayre aquelas pessas, si so separadas.	But if the wound has penetrated the bone, and there are already fragments of bone sticking out, then you should clean the wound and try to remove those fragments if they are loose.
Mays si no so separadas, lahoras leyssa las entro que se poyresca la plagua, que la extraccio de lor es alleujada.	But if they are not loose, then leave them until the wound can heal, as removing them would be painful.
